name: Rwd-iframe
tagline: Demonstration of combining Responsive Webdesign anf Iframe
body:
#Demonstration of combining Responsive Webdesign anf Iframe 
On this page I will demonstrate how to put a  iframe containing a responsive table, to see if how they both react.
Note: for this to work, you will have either load in an iframe containing a table that is already responsove, or be in control of that iframe yourself.

##Demonstration 

A demo can found here: ...

for more info [follow me on twitter](https://twitter.com/johanbijlsma)
